website_summaries.verdict: This affordable chargers works well as a power bank, but its small solar panel may not keep up with some users' power needs.
pros: Solar panel helps keep battery charged when away from an outlet
cons: Solar charger alone won’t fully charge the power bank

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit
customer_reviews.text: The unit is exactly as advertised. Works well and charges iPhone in about 30 minutes. The Led light is great for backpacking or as an emergency light. It's a good value for the price. It's lightweight and easy to fit in my backpack pocket. Would def. recommend this unit as a must have for anyone looking to travel.
customer_reviews.author: SHC

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but solar charging is slow

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My first one was defective and didn't charge properly. The company responded quickly and credited my account for the purchase price. I consider this a valuable emergency tool - you've always got power for your smart devices even in a blackout.
